name: Untitled Horror Game (morbidcakemaker)
description:
Submitted to the Great Autumn Game Jam: 2021

This is my first indie dev project. I would very much value feedback on how to improve the game. Thank you for playing! 

Disclaimer: This is a very early tech demo of the game, made using free assets available on itch.io. Art, content and gameplay are highly susceptible to change.
